resources.string:
1. To set a location: Long press the map marker and drag it to the destination or just type in a 5-digit zip code of the destination. 
2. Click the GetWeather button to get the current weather of selected location. 
3. Click the favorite button to save a location, before saving, please get the weather of that location first. 
4. Long click to delete saved locations. 
5. In Settings, users can set a username for greeting, and turn on/off audio report.
Access to the location service is required, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'WeatherBuddy\'.
